name: pdfviewerswitcher
description: Add a toolbar button and context menu to reload a pdf page in the Adobe Acrobat plugin
author: Joachim Herb <joachim.herb@gmx.de>

preferences.name: debugLog
preferences.title: Debug logging
preferences.description: Show debug messages in error console.

preferences.name: enableAllPlugins
preferences.title: Activate all PDF plugins
preferences.description: Activate all PDF plugins, so document loading starts immediately
